title: 310: Bekah’s Botox + The Broad’s Strange Obsession + Jess is Blazing + Tough Parenthood Conversations
itunes:title: 310: Bekah’s Botox + The Broad’s Strange Obsession + Jess is Blazing + Tough Parenthood Conversations
description:
In today’s episode The Broad’s have a tangential episode catching up on what has been going on in their personal lives! They discuss Bekah’s recent experience with botox, they discover a similar unique obsession they have, chat about haunted house updates, Jess’ new weed life, therapy, TV reviews, and then they dive into a raw conversation about recent parenting struggles. 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***DIPSEA: get an extended 30-day free trial when you go to DIPSEASTORIES.COM/CHATTY
